title: "Hey Google" does not respond
content:
Hello Google team,

In my Pixel 5 phone, "Hey Google" voice command is not working. 

I checked google assistant settings. I have already turned on Hey Google voice match and retrain voice model. My phone is not in battery saver mode. Still it does not respond to my voice. In addition, I also turned on continued conversation feature.

What else can I try? It used to respond to hey Google previously. Somehow after recent phone update it stopped responding.
